Text: What the hell does this do? It came with no instructions and the program itself looks suspicious as fuck. Programs like this are why I run Deep Freeze just in case shit hits the fan.
The instructions as well as a press release should appear when the software is opened

I think that guy that came up with the software is Rip Cord. This is his web site and its freeware.
www.get-a-million-hits.com.
